description: Matte gold cap with elegant black script ‘Nils • Oscar’; a small circular halftone portrait sits between the words.
Green-rimmed white cap showing an engraving of the brewery above bold burgundy ‘NAMYSŁÓW’; script ‘Pils’ with a small hops cluster below.
White cap with heraldic crest and arched text ‘PRIVATBRAUEREI SEIT 1882’; large metallic-green ‘Nothhaft’ over ‘Marktredwitz’.
Deep blue cap with white sprouting-leaf logo and ‘NESTEA’; small Spanish bottler text runs around the edge.
Red/orange roundel featuring a yellow bicycle; ringed text reads ‘NEW BELGIUM BREWING’.
Weathered gold cap with stacked white gothic lettering ‘Old Style’.
White twist-off cap with ornate gold scrollwork crest bearing a red shield and large ‘P’; the word ‘open’ appears twice with arrows.
Minimal green cap with straightforward white ‘NEFILTRUOTAS’ and smaller gold ‘RAW’ centered.
Red-and-gold circular design with bold ‘ОХОТА’; top ring reads ‘Чемпионат мира по хоккею’, black puck marked ‘2012’ below.
Bright green cap with cream ‘PREMIUM’ above large white ‘O’DOUL’S’ outlined in yellow; thin gold rim.
Matte red cap with a weathered pattern; bold white ‘MANNS’ centered above smaller text ‘BROWN ALE’.
Deep red cap with gold silhouette of a man in a tricorne hat pointing; flanked text reads ‘EST.’ and ‘1711’ over ‘MORLAND’.
Yellow cap with brown ‘malta’ script under a small ‘DG’ in a circle; barley sprig underline.
Dark green cap featuring a hop-cone crest; red banner ‘MASTER BREW’ above green ribbon ‘KENTISH ALE’.
Faded yellow-green cap with stylized green ‘Mythos’ script; red circle with horse-head emblem above.
White cap with blue ‘Michelob ULTRA’ wordmark and small ribbon icon at left.
Cream cap dominated by a large orange circle-and-drop graphic; small block ‘NFI’ along the lower left.
Bright orange cap with casual black handwritten-style wordmark ‘maltizz’ across the center.
Black cap with circular lion head medallion; arched yellow lettering ‘NILE’ above and ‘SPECIAL’ below.
Black cap with orange sunburst; bold ‘MOCARZ’ across the top and oval ‘9%’ highlighted in yellow.
Glossy black cap with a gold circular seal featuring crossed mash tools, a small pail and hop cones; Latin rim text reads ‘MAGISTRATUS WILKOMIRIA’.
Black twist-off cap with a white oval bordered in green and red ‘dew’ wordmark; small ‘OPEN’ arrows and Arabic script around the rim.
Matte black cap with a rough lemon-ring outline and distressed lowercase ‘mike’s’ logotype.
Brushed gold cap showing hop bines framed by ribboned text ‘MENDOCINO BREWING COMPANY’; bottom text reads ‘USE OPENER’.
Pearl-white cap with ornate blue script ‘Maisel’s Weisse’ and wheat sprig; solid blue bar at bottom reads ‘ALKOHOLFREI’.
White cap with green Fraktur ‘Lübzer Pils’; small crest above shows a yellow/red roundel with a stylized tower; thin gold ring.
Bright red cap with flowing white ‘Liefmans’ script and a small figure holding a glass; tagline ‘MASTER BLENDERS’ beneath.
Cream-white cap with metallic orange ‘Menabrea’ wordmark; small numerals ‘1846’ arched above.
White cap featuring a red double-peak emblem over black ‘MOONBERG’; cursive ‘lager’ below.
White cap with bold orange ‘MEISTER FELS’ lettering and an ornate sheaf-of-grain crest at the top.
Aged gold cap with a black cormorant in flight above ‘BROWAR KORMORAN’; Polish tagline ‘Piwa warzone z pasją’ below within a double ring.
Matte white cap with gold ‘KIRIN’ and Japanese ‘一番搾り’ centered; smaller ‘ICHIBAN’ at the bottom.
White cap with red ribbon script ‘Isleña’; bilingual ring text reads ‘LA CERVEZA DE IBIZA’ / ‘THE BEER OF IBIZA’.
Off-white cap with the gold kirin crest above ‘KIRIN’ and Japanese ‘一番搾り’.
Cream-and-maroon cap with crest and ‘Anno 1791’ at top; bold white ‘Kwak’ logotype over a cream field with founder signature.
Metallic red cap with oval ‘Kiper’ wordmark; outer ring reads ‘BROWAR’ and ‘PIOTRKÓW TRYBUNALSKI’ with small ‘2000’ at bottom.
Gold cap with intricate brown barley-and-hop motif; a small red plaque at the base reads ‘KLOUD’.
Worn gold cap featuring a green ‘K’ medallion framed by wheat and hops; Cyrillic banner ‘КРЫНИЦА’ at the bottom.
White cap with italic green ‘ivy light’ wordmark and small leaf motif; faint blue ornamental stamps near the rim.
White cap with red ring and colorful kingfisher bird above an arched ‘KINGFISHER’ banner; yellow ‘PREMIUM’ panel below.
Ivory-white cap with thin red rim; red line-art of a goat’s head adorned with grain and hops; bold red ‘KOŹLAK’ above.
Metallic red cap with slanted white banner ‘Królewskie’; outer ring reads ‘KRÓLEWSKI SMAK’ on top and ‘WARSZAWSKIE’ below.
Gold/cream cap with black ‘Kaltenberg’ script under a crowned Bavarian shield flanked by two lions; thin black border.
Gold cap with black outer text ‘Kronenkorken Jagd 2010’; red center disc bearing a bold black outlined ‘W’.
White cap with blue oval sunburst; pale yellow ‘JOHANNES’ across a horizontal blue bar in the center.
White cap printed in blue with shield-style emblem featuring grain and hop cones; text reads ‘Karg Weißbier’.
White cap with red ring; gold crown medallion at top; elegant script ‘König Pilsener’ across the center.
Deep blue cap dotted with yellow stars; arched yellow banner in the middle reads ‘KOPERNIK’.
Red twist-off cap with large white ‘IMPRESS’; small ‘TWIST OFF’ text along the rim with arrows.
White cap with blue fountain-like arcs and red lowercase ‘krynka’, underlined by a dark swoosh.
Heavily worn silver-gold cap with a black script ‘Kinley’ logotype; small crown icon centered above the wordmark.
Brushed silver cap with black text ‘LITTLE VALLEY BREWERY’; stylized twin-leaf emblem beneath the wording.
White cap with bold green ring and central green plaque; white-outlined ‘Lāčplēsis’ across the middle.
Deep blue cap with large stacked lettering ‘KEYSTONE LIGHT’ in white with light drop shadow.
Bright yellow cap featuring red ‘Lipton’ badge over green leaves; blue script ‘Ice Tea’ along the bottom.
Red cap with circular white seal; outer ring reads ‘WOODSHED’ and ‘BREWING CO’, ornate script ‘Lazy Jack’s®’ in the center.
Navy blue cap with red diagonal ribbons and a white oval; inside reads ‘Kronenbourg 1664’.
Matte yellow cap with small ‘CITRON’ above large blue ‘LOKA’ wordmark; minimalist design.
Aged gold cap with red central panel ‘KLASIK’; arched text ‘TRADIČNÍ RECEPTURA’ around the edge.
Dark blue cap with white ‘KALIBER’ lettering edged in red; above is a white unicorn head crest.
Half red/half white cap with three gold crowns above bold Gothic ‘Früh’; small ‘KÖLSCH’ text at the bottom.
White cap with a red slanted panel and gold crown; tall serif ‘FASBERG’ wordmark.
Aged bronze/brown cap with black banner; red shield bearing an ‘F’ centered above ‘FORTAS’.
Red cap with splash/foam motif around italic ‘Freskola’ logotype in white.
Bright red cap with thin gold ring; arched white ‘LONDON PRIDE’ letters with drop shadow.
Deep red cap with large ‘LAUSITZER’; black inset panel below reading ‘DUNKEL’.
White cap with metallic blue-gold script ‘Lindener Spezial’.
Gold cap with ring text ‘LES BRASSEURS DE GAYANT’; central white line drawing of a jester figure.
Black cap with neon-green double ring and bold white ‘LONDONER.’ across the center.
Black cap with vertical red bar; white ‘Köstritzer’ wordmark over ‘SCHWARZBIER’ in gold.
Chrome cap with castle-crenellation crest; red shield bearing a bold white ‘F’ at center within a dark border.
Cream cap with tall red lowercase type set in two lines: ‘diet-rite’ over ‘cola’.
Green cap with gold-embossed quartered crest above serif ‘DISTELHÄUSER’; faint gold slogan beneath.
Scenic crest at top; blackletter ‘Freiberger’ across a white ribbon; bottom band reads ‘ALKOHOL FREI’.
Deep-blue cap with sharp white ‘DIAMOND’ above a script ‘White’ swoosh.
Green cap with large red script ‘Fantic’; small baseline text in Polish along the lower banner.
Red cap with ornate gold oval showing brewery scene and dancers; cursive ‘Export’ at bottom.
Brushed-silver cap with bold black ‘EPIC’ and hop-leaf motif; ‘BREWING’ in small caps below.
Gold cap with blue ‘F S’ flanking a white sail; circular legend reads ‘INDEPENDENT • EMPLOYEE-OWNED’.
Bright pink cap with flowing white ‘Friels’ script over small ‘cider’ in lowercase.
Green cap with white double border and framed rectangle; bold white “DAB” at center with “SEIT 1868” and a small tower crest above.
Deep-blue cap with yellow swooshes forming an oval; solid white “EFES” wordmark in the middle.
White cap with green recycling-style arrows circle and small crest at top; large green “FINKBRÄU” text.
Red cap with white circular band and bold Arabic logotype; dotted date code printed over the center.
Bright red cap reading “DAURA” with “Premium Quality Lager Beer”; small “Estrella Damm” name above a wreath.
Ivory cap with bold red “EKSTRA” and cursive “Draught” beneath; weathered paint around the rim.
Bronze/brown cap with shield bearing St. George’s cross flanked by two lions; arched “DRINK OF” above and “ENGLAND” below.
Black ring with white lettering around a red field and cream eight-point star; text reads “ESTRELLA GALICIA · CERVECEROS DESDE 1906”.
Gold cap with blue script “Export” and ribbon bearing “SEIT 1731”; central round crest referencing the Kollmar family.
Red-and-blue ring surrounding a stylized wheat-ear emblem; white “ERDINGER” above and “WEISSBRÄU” below.
Red cap with white diamond and rising rays beneath five stars; center reads ‘CERVEJA DO BRASIL’ with ‘18’ and ‘88’ flanking the diamond.
Glossy black cap featuring a white sugar-skull graphic; top text ‘CUBANISTO’, bottom ‘RUM’.
Metallic red and gold cap with sunburst; bold white ‘САМАРА’ over ribbon text ‘СВЕТЛОЕ ПИВО’.
Black cap with large red dragon at center; arched words ‘DRAGON’ above and ‘STOUT’ below.
Aged black-and-gold cap with circular emblem showing a stylized boat; surrounding Cyrillic brewery text and ‘Самара’ at top.
Yellow cap with green hemp leaf and red-outlined blue ‘Cannabia’ wordmark.
Matte gold cap with debossed framed logotype ‘CUSQUEÑA’.
Yellow cap with blue ‘Carib’ script, red ‘Lager’ and globe emblem; blue and white ringed border.
Bright red cap with white pine-tree silhouettes and bold ‘ÇAMLICA’ lettering.
White cap with thin gold ring and heraldic crest above the classic red ‘Duvel’ logotype; small ‘ANNO 1871’ flanking the crest.
White cap with crest at top and bold ‘CLAUSTHALER CLASSIC’; red ribbon ‘PREMIUM ALKOHOLFREI’ below.
White cap with black oval and stylized text ‘Browar Gontyniec’.
Brushed gold cap with walking bear and ribbon text ‘BEAR REPUBLIC’ and ‘BREWING CO.’
Brushed silver cap with lowercase ‘beershake’ and two curved arrows.
Yellow cap with red eagle and script ‘Colombiana’; small red lozenge ‘la nuestra’.
White cap with blue ring text ‘BREWED LONGER · PREMIUM QUALITY’ surrounding a large blue ‘C’.
Green cap with yellow swoosh and big ‘$1000’; white ‘Costeñita’ logotype above.
Red cap with diagonal white band ‘Cruzcampo’ and caption ‘DESDE 1904’.
White cap with blue ‘cafri’ script; pale stamps and grey ‘TWIST CAP’ arrows around rim.
Deep blue cap with white-outlined ‘CHIMAY’ and small gold ‘Trappist’ beneath.
White cap with black ‘CELIA’ and a ring of triangular facets forming a wreath.
Cobalt-blue cap dominated by large distressed white ‘BG’ letters.
Glossy black cap with white serif ‘Cappy’ wordmark.
Golden cap with wheat background, crest at top, and bold ‘CIECHAN’ banner.
Cream cap with red circular field and griffin; black ‘ARGUS’ across a white band.
White cap with illustration of a red-brick brewery above bold ‘BOJAN’ flanked by barley spikes.
Aged gold cap with red Berlin bear holding three glasses; green arched text ‘EIN BERLINER’ on both sides.
Pale-gold cap with iconic red triangle and cursive ‘Bass’ signature.
Black cap with white running badger motif and circular text ‘BREWED IN … DORSET’.
Yellow-brown cap with concentric ring design; ‘BREWER’S PRIDE SELECTION’ and ‘CRAFT BREW’ around ‘SHINER’.
White cap with large red crowned monogram and cursive ‘Mora’ at the bottom.
Gold-and-green oval badge with ‘Gründel’s’; KARLSBERG banner on top, red ‘ALKOHOLFREI’ strip and ‘fresh’ script.
Black center with white polar bear and ‘Harboe’ script; white rim.
Gold cap with teal-and-red banner ‘HOLDEN’S’ and oval portrait; ribbon reads ‘BLACK COUNTRY · BORN & BREWED’.
Bright yellow cap with red ring; green ‘Hachenburger’ and red ‘Malz’, boar illustration above.
Aged black cap with large gold ‘Hank’s’; surrounding text ‘GOURMET’ and ‘BEVERAGES’.
White cap with blue fountain logo and ‘Iwoniczanka’; Polish text ‘NIEGAZOWANA · WODA ŹRÓDLANA’ around edge.
White badge with star and three barrel monogram ‘I & G’; ring text ‘INNIS GUNN · OAK AGED BEER’.
Silver cap with blue-outlined gothic ‘Hoegaarden’ wordmark.
White cap with blue diagonal ICEHOUSE banner, thin red stripe, and pale skyline above.
Metallic red cap with cream ring and circular text ‘GLORIETTA’ repeated around a blank center.
Blue cap with a red-yellow heart banner; script ‘Gaffel Kölsch’ across the center with small stars.
Brushed gold cap with crown/leaf emblem above bold white ‘GAYMERS’ wordmark.
Gold cap with oval badge showing a lyrebird and wreath; outer ring repeats ‘100% PURE BEER’.
Bright green cap with distressed finish; yellow ‘GINGERS’ over ‘BEER’ separated by short bars.
Glossy black cap with elegant gold script ‘Grand’ and smaller ‘IMPERIAL PORTER’; thin gold rim.
Black cap with profile goose head and yellow bill; arched ‘GOOSE’ and ‘ISLAND’ in white.
Light-blue center with red ‘GULPENER’ logotype; dark-blue ring with Dutch text and gold rim.
White cap with red pointed shield bearing a white lowercase ‘h’; gold hop sprigs on sides and gold border.
Matte gold cap with large brown ‘GOLDEN LAGER’; small ornamental stamps top and bottom and caption ‘AUTHENTIC GERMAN STYLE 100% MALT BEER’.
Orange cap with green-white swirl and lowercase ‘frestea’ wordmark; rim shows BPOM code, bottom reads HALAL and ‘MINUMAN TEH BERAROMA MELATI’.
White cap split by deep-blue panel; bold ‘FIX’ over ‘HELLAS’ in classic Greek brewery style.
Black cap with concentric gold rings; large block ‘FAXE’ at center, ‘FAXE BRYGGERI’ above and ‘PREMIUM’ below.
Metallic red cap with gold shield showing three figures and a flag; text ‘GAMBRINUS ARMY CAMP’ in the crest.
Glossy black cap with white ‘FREEZ’ logotype encircled by three chasing arrows.
Magenta/pink cap with playful script ‘Ginger Beer’; white outline with green ‘Beer’ accent.
Aged gold cap with red banner ‘GUBERNIJA’; two goats with hop vines over a barrel; cursive ‘Anno 1665’ below.
Red cap with gold star inside a ring; ‘GOLDSTAR’ at top and Hebrew ‘גולדסטאר’ around the bottom.
Gold cap with stylized red flower and green accents; rim text reads ‘ORYGINALNY IMBIROWY SMAK’ and ‘GINGER TASTE’.
White cap with rough, ink-splatter ‘FLYING DOG’ lettering and bat-wing dog logo inside a thin black ring.
Aged gold cap with stippled finish; green‑outlined white letters ‘BANGLA’ and pink Bengali script ‘বাংলা’ above.
Navy‑blue promotional cap: silver text ‘BALONAZOS’ over football swirl in Colombian flag colours; lower banner ‘LIGA POSTOBON’ with striker silhouette.
Off‑white cap with ice‑blue word ‘BALTAS’; navy subtitle ‘KVIETINIS ALUS’ (wheat beer).
Yellow cap weathered to olive; twin griffins support red shield with Cyrillic ‘Б’, crown above; ribbon ‘ВЫСШЕЕ КАЧЕСТВО 1999’.
Champagne‑gold cap; black frame encloses trio of Liberty‑bell silhouettes; header text ‘BELL’S®’.
Cream cap with full‑colour gnome bending with sheaf; circular legend ‘BRASSERIE D’ACHOUFFE · BELGIUM’.
Cobalt‑blue cap; white Alsatian head motif above warning text ‘BEWARE OF IMITATIONS’.
Gold‑rim cap with white centre panel; blackletter ‘Bitburger’, script ‘Premium Beer’, tiny portrait and motto ‘Bitte ein Bit’.
Bright‑yellow cap; red banner with white ‘BELL’, golden bell icon above; curved bottom text ‘PREMIUM QUALITY LAGER’.
Green cap with barley‑ear flanks; broad white roundel features large red ‘A’; bilingual ring text ‘ALFA BEER · ΑΛΦΑ ΖΥΘΟΣ’.
Antique‑gold cap with red crown inside circular frame; legend ‘BROWAR ZAMKOWY A.D. 1567 RACIBÓRZ’ arched around.
Metallic‑silver cap over‑printed deep blue; centre shows silver script ‘B’ monogram with trailing bar; small ‘TM’ below.
White cap with thin green ring; gold Cyrillic ‘Біле’ and subtitle ‘НЕФІЛЬТРОВАНЕ’ (unfiltered wheat).
Bright‑red cap with white border and bold block lettering ‘BAUSKAS ALUS’.
Aged gold‑tone cap with red ring; faint centre emblem and white‑outlined word ‘BOCK’ at top—details heavily worn.
White cap printed carmine; intricate heraldic dragon inside circle; border text ‘BOON RAWD BREWERY CO. LTD.’.
Weathered white‑silver cap; top half bears red F. Brinkhoff signature; green panel ‘BRINKHOFF’S’; red script ‘No 1’ below.
Fluorescent‑orange cap with pale silver wordmark ‘ARCHERS’ and smaller ‘AQUA’ beneath.
Dark, heavily patinated cap with red rim; block serif text ‘ADLER BOCK’ in muted gold.
Deep‑blue cap with white logotype ‘Boelens’; small caption underneath reads ‘AUTHENTIC BELGIAN BREWERY’.
Glossy black cap with gold crest (crowned ‘J’ roundel); text ring ‘BROWAR JAGIEŁŁO · REGIONALNY BROWAR RODZINNY’.
Blue cap with stylised ‘BL’ monogram, white speed‑swoosh and red accent; small lettering ‘BUD LIGHT’ below.
Bright‑green cap; red bar with white ‘BROK’, gold crown and star above the name.
Navy‑blue cap with gold rim; inner circle shows pale‑blue square sun emblem; text ring ‘BLUE MOON BREWING COMPANY™’.
Metallic‑gold cap with green panel and Cyrillic ‘ЗОЛОТАЯ БОЧКА’; top shows barrel and hops emblem.
Royal‑blue cap; cream serif title ‘BALTIJOS’ and subtitle ‘TAMSUSIS ALUS’ (dark beer).
Off‑white cap with blue ring repeating ‘ICE COLD EASY’; centre features bold ‘BUSCH LIGHT®’ logo.
Silver‑grey cap printed like coarse fabric; large stacked lettering ‘BERGHOFF BREWERY’ with arcs ‘A MIDWEST TRADITION OF CRAFT BREWING’.
Black cap with cream calligraphic script arranged radially to spell ‘Black Sheep Ale’; includes three‑ring Celtic knot motif at centre.
Gloss‑blue cap with light‑blue logotype ‘ADNAMS’ above smaller white ‘SOUTHWOLD’.
Mustard‑yellow cap; black‑gold crown and hop‑cone crest ‘1860’, wheat ears either side; white ring with brand name ‘BROWARY GÓRNOŚLĄSKIE’.
Purple cap with white zig‑zag border; text ‘PRY OFF CAP’ and ‘Abita! — BREWED WITH SPRING WATER’.
Red cap featuring inverted olive‑green triangle with red word‑mark ‘AMBAR’ centred inside.
Gradated blue‑white cap; ‘DANONE’ panel above ornate ‘AQUA®’ logotype and stylised mountain/wave graphic.
Antique‑brass cap; circular seal with hop‑cone, outer text ‘AUS TRADITION – PRIVAT’, inner banner ‘gebraut nach dem Reinheitsgebot 1516’.
Deep‑blue cap bearing large stylised black letter ‘B’ outlined in silver; no further wording.
Light‑tan twist‑off cap; red eagle over barrel, circular text ‘America’s Oldest Brewery’ with directional arrows.
White cap with distinctive green Fraktur title ‘Bohemia regent®’ stacked in two lines.
White cap; bold red ‘BG’ flanked by yellow wheat sprig and green hop cones; arched brand wording round the rim.
White‑face cap with green gilt rim (competition text ‘Aktions‑Kronkorken’); Krombacher arms above black logotype, five gold stars and script ‘Pils’.
Grey cap, thin red rim; white ‘T’ on stylised black eagle shield, legend ‘NO RETORNABLE’ along lower edge.
Gold cap completely covered by cream filigree; centre medallion shows two lions flanking a barrel.
Gold version of the non‑returnable cap; black eagle with white outline and ‘T’, wording ‘MEDIA NO RETORNABLE’ below.
Weathered gold cap; black oval cartouche with two lions and barrel; small caption ‘ANNO 1853’ underneath.
Bronze‑gold cap with green‑red crowned hops emblem and wheat sheaves; red banner ‘BROWARY GÓRNOŚLĄSKIE 1890’.
Oval‑badge cap, blue outer ring; Krombacher crest, black logotype, orange wheat band ‘Weizen’ and footer ‘ALKOHOLFREI’.
White cap with fine red border; crest, black ‘Krombacher’ and red ribbon ‘ALKOHOLFREI’; five gold stars.
Orange cap; black wood‑cut style goblin with axe, circular legend ‘HOBGOBLIN’ twice (upright / inverted).
Deep‑blue variant of the goblin cap, gold outline illustration with axe and repeating rim text ‘HOBGOBLIN’.
White cap with gold cartouche; horn‑in‑wheat crest and upper text ‘ANNO ★ 1366’; three medals at bottom.
Second example—same white & gold layout but slight print‑shift / scuffing, useful for variant collectors.
Old‑style pale‑gold cap with large red scroll ‘Sol’; small word ‘CERVEZA’ above.
Red‑rim cap; olive centre with radiating sun rays and stylised sun face; bold red ‘Sol’ plus small ‘CERVEZA’.
Cobalt‑blue cap with white script ‘Ustronianka’ and swoosh underline.
Orange flavour variant; same white logotype, heavy surface rust on shown specimen.
Gold‑tone cap with red ‘W’ hops crest; black script ‘Wernesgrüner’ and subtitle ‘PILS LEGENDE’.
Brushed‑wood effect background; blue lower band with white ‘ALKOHOLFREI’; same red‑crest logo above.
Gold cap with green‑red diagonal tricolour stripe; partial stylised ‘San M…’ logotype in green and red.
Later design: white ribbon bearing full ‘San Miguel’ word‑mark across gold background with galleon crest.
Green twist‑off cap; big white stacked text ‘FRU / MENT’ over moustache icon, small ‘TYMBARK’ shield above (est. 1936).
White twist‑off cap with minimalist black outline of two facing hens above bold word ‘TYMBARK’.
Orange‑gold cap; Gothic ‘Schöfferhofer’ over twin shield monogram; black ring text ‘HEFEWEIZEN’ top and bottom.
Orange cap variant for grapefruit mix; same Gothic logo with lower panel ‘GRAPEFRUIT – HEFEWEIZEN‑MIX’.
Speckled emerald cap with white legend ‘SIERRA NEVADA’; outer wording ‘FRESH SEAL CAP – USE BOTTLE OPENER’.
Pale olive/khaki version of the Fresh‑Seal cap; black lettering, same bottle‑opener instructions around rim.
Dark‑green cap; ornate crest with red ‘S’; Gothic ‘Svijany’; gold Czech ring text ‘TRADIČNÍ PIVO · BEZ PASTERIZACE’.
Black field variant of Svijany crest; red Gothic initial ‘S’ within heraldic shield, gold logotype and date ‘1564’.
Bright‑red cider cap with distressed camouflage pattern and silver word‑mark ‘WOODPECKER®’ centred.
Weathered red cap showing two stylised opposing red arcs on a silvery disc; no lettering—identity unconfirmed.
Light‑grey cap with Hebrew logotype ‘מאלטי’; small handwritten word above and black sunrise/flare motif.
Bright‑yellow cap with identical Hebrew branding; black sunrise/flare symbol over white‑outlined lettering.
Plain green cap with centred white serif word ‘Original’; minimalist design with no other markings.
Plain sky‑blue cap featuring single white word ‘Smooth’ in matching serif font; partner to the ‘Original’ cap.
Yellow cap displaying a stylised three‑leaf sprout in solid green; no text—a clean eco‑style icon.
Orange companion cap with the same green triple‑leaf symbol; otherwise unlettered.
Blue‑rim cap; yellow diamond with dark‑green outline; inscriptions ‘REG. TRADE MARK – SALITOS ICE’; outer ring text ‘IMPORTED · SUPERIOR’.
Red field variant; yellow‑green diamond and banner ‘SALITOS TEQUILA’; weathered gold rim, outer ring text faint.
Silver cap; large vertical red ‘ROMAN’ with script ‘Kola’ above; Spanish advisory text around rim.
Silver promotional cap: red bar ‘PROMOCION’ under the classic ‘Kola ROMAN’ logotype; fine‑print ingredients in red below.
Lime‑green cap; bold blue logotype ‘FRUTTI’ with red swoosh; white ‘uludağ’ crest above and Turkish text ‘Doğal Zengin Mineralli Gazlı İçecek’ below.
Dark‑green cap; yellow logotype ‘uludağ’ and legend ‘Doğal Maden Suyu’; small red‑white mountain emblem above.
Matte gold cap with embossed central Andean glyph; no surrounding text – minimalist emblem version.
Gold cap with red ring bearing text ‘DESDE 1961 · MAESTRÍA CERVECERA’; same Andean glyph in centre.
Metallic magenta cap; large white ‘X’ slash over background, lower left reads ‘3 % / 3.1 vol.’
Chrome‑silver cap with sky‑blue ‘X’; bottom legend ‘5 % vol.’ – stronger variant of the brand.
White‑rim cap; inner circle in bronze with gothic script ‘Złoty Denar’; red pennant ‘Premium Golden Beer’ above.
Green version of the cap; yellowish interior vignette, same gothic ‘Złoty Denar’ logo and red pennant banner.
White cap with solid black silhouette of a diving eagle, wings spread, talons forward.
Bright‑blue cap featuring the same black eagle silhouette in flight motif centred on the field.
Gold‑rim cap with blue centre; stylised shepherd’s crook (omega‑shape) and text ring ‘SHEPHERD NEAME · SINCE 1698’.
Blue cap with large gold ‘1698’ and red ribbon ‘300 YEARS’; wording ‘SHEPHERD — NEAME’ around the edge.
Silver cap marking 500th anniversary (1487‑1987); smiling monk with stein; banner ‘MÜNCHNER BIER® 500 JAHRE’.
Silver cap for 525 years (1487‑2012); identical monk motif; banner reads ‘MÜNCHNER BIER® 525 JAHRE’.
Bright‑red cap with white ring and green‑gold rooster; arched text ‘COURAGE’ along lower rim.
Gold cap with red rooster outline and faint ‘COURAGE’ circle—weathered / low‑ink variant of the classic design.
Cream cap with distressed green stencil text ‘PIWO NIEPASTERYZOWANE’ (unpasteurised beer).
Light‑yellow cap with distressed red stencil text ‘PIWO PSZENICZNE’ (wheat beer).
White cap with circular blue/gold ring and monk head profile; text 'PAULANER MÜNCHEN.'
Red/white cap variant of Paulaner monk seal; rim text 'ALKOHOLFREI.'
White mottled cap; black MALVERN PRESS panel and large lime‑green '81' script.
White mottled cap; black MALVERN PRESS panel and large red '81' script.
Dark blue cap with banner 'EXTRA BITTER TYPE' and large yellow 'QUEEN'S ALE.'
Red cap with banner 'BLONDE TYPE' and large white 'QUEEN'S ALE.'
Black cap with thin gold rim; stacked gold text 'BIRRA PERONI' between short horizontal bars.
White cap with red ring 'BIRRA PERONI'; blue eagle crest top; gold wreath/stein center; '1846' at bottom.
Brown cap with white 'pardál' and yellow 'Echt' export variant lettering.
White cap with red 'pardál' logotype; weathered finish.
White cap with red diagonal bar 'Red Stripe'; rim text 'Brewed For Over 75 Years' top, 'Jamaica Lager Beer' bottom.
White cap with red diagonal bar 'Red Stripe'; rim text 'Brewed In Jamaica.'
